titlestmt.titleproper: Presbyterian Graduate School of Religious Education Board of Directors records 1921-1927
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Presbyterian Graduate School of Religious Education Board of Directors records

bioghist.p: The Presbyterian Graduate School of Religious Education was established in 1903 as the Deaconess Home and Training School at Baltimore, Maryland. In 1911 the name was changed to the Presbyterian Training School in the City of Baltimore and in 1924 the name was again changed to the Presbyterian Graduate School of Religious Education of Baltimore, Maryland.

scopecontent.p: This volume contains minutes of meetings of the Board of Directors of the Presbyterian Graduate School of Religious Education, 1921 to 1927. The minutes include reports by committees, by-laws, resolutions, and other routine business. The volume also includes a brief history of the school.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
